dialogue_patterns.stranger: வணக்கம் (Vanakkam)! Welcome to Chennai! I'm Anna, your auto driver.
dialogue_patterns.acquaintance: Ready for another adventure around Chennai?
dialogue_patterns.friend: என் நண்பா (En nanba - My friend)! What shall we explore today?
dialogue_patterns.close_friend: You're becoming a true Chennai person! So proud of you!
dialogue_patterns.family: நீங்க இப்ப எங்க குடும்பத்தோட ஒரு பங்கு (You're now part of our family)!

dialogue_patterns.stranger: அய்யா/அம்மா (Ayya/Amma)! Best prices in T. Nagar! What you need?
dialogue_patterns.acquaintance: You're back! Ready to find some great deals today?
dialogue_patterns.friend: My favorite customer! I saved something special for you!
dialogue_patterns.close_friend: You have such good taste! Let me teach you the art of bargaining!
dialogue_patterns.family: You're like family now! Take this with my blessing - no charge!

dialogue_patterns.stranger: The sea has many stories... Would you like to hear one?
dialogue_patterns.acquaintance: Ah, you return to the sea. It calls to you, doesn't it?
dialogue_patterns.friend: Let me tell you about the time when Chennai was just Madras...
dialogue_patterns.close_friend: You understand the rhythm of the waves now. That's wisdom.
dialogue_patterns.family: The sea accepts you as its own. You carry Chennai in your heart.

dialogue_patterns.stranger: நமஸ்கார் (Namaskar). Welcome to this sacred space. May I guide you?
dialogue_patterns.acquaintance: I see devotion growing in your heart. That's beautiful.
dialogue_patterns.friend: Come, let me show you the deeper meanings behind these rituals.
dialogue_patterns.close_friend: Your respect for our traditions touches my heart deeply.
dialogue_patterns.family: You have truly understood the soul of Tamil culture. I'm honored.

dialogue_patterns.stranger: Hey there! New to Chennai's tech scene? I can show you around!
dialogue_patterns.acquaintance: Back for more Chennai tech culture? Cool!
dialogue_patterns.friend: Dude, you're getting the hang of this Chennai vibe! Super!
dialogue_patterns.close_friend: நீ இப்ப full Chennai-க்கார ஆயிட்டே (You've become a complete Chennaite)!
dialogue_patterns.family: Bro, you're family now! Chennai runs in your blood!

friend.description: Share stories, teach slang, give advice
